name: Alley Hunter
description: An intricate, opulent longbow. It once belonged to a gentleman thief who was never caught.
effect: While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by {0} every second up to a max of {1}. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by {2} per second until it reaches 0%.
